project.title: Children's Hospital Tracheostomy Simulator
project.description: Sponsored by the Children's Hospital of Colorado, I was a part of a team tasked with the completion of a 3D interactive Tracheostomy procedure simulator. Tackling the project using Agile methodologies, we developed in the Unity game engine using C# scripting.

project.title: Firework Sandbox Game
project.description: As a final project for my Computer Graphics course, I built a firework sandbox minigame where the player can choose a color and shoot fireworks in an open carnival-themed environment. The game was developed using C programming and the OpenGL library and features lighting and particle effects in a custom 3D environment.

project.title: Custom Connect-4 Game
project.description: The classic Connect 4 board game with an added twist. Developed using the Qt framework and the C++ language, recreated Connect 4 with added bonus powerups that allow players to destroy entire rows, columns, or 3x3 squares in one turn.
